catalog_info.title: Rajasthan Pashudhan Ganana - Livestock Census
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides livestock population data for various districts of Rajasthan. It is valuable for AI modeling related to livestock management, disease prediction, and agricultural planning, enabling data-driven decision-making for resource allocation and policy formulation.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.department: Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying
